channel.title: Need help with trading
channel.description: When I go to trade a player on my server, All of the offer amounts except 'Offer 1' do not work I need to make it so the Offer 5,10,50,X work... I've spent hours looking for a tutorial on this.. can anyone help?

item.title: Need help with trading
item.dc:creator: @jacobkid jacobkid
item.description:
@jacobkid wrote:

When I go to trade a player on my server, All of the offer amounts except ‘Offer 1’ do not work
I need to make it so the Offer 5,10,50,X work…
I’ve spent hours looking for a tutorial on this… can anyone help?

Read full topic
